app.name: ThreadX sample project
app.description: Project includes ThreadX, BSP, and CMT. This sample is the standard 8-thread ThreadX example, that illustrates the use of the main ThreadX services, including threads, message queues, timers, semaphores, byte memory pools, block memory pools, event flag groups, and mutexes

app.name: ThreadX minimal sample project
app.description: This project is the simplest sample using ThreadX. It toggles LED and outputs information to the serial terminal.

app.name: FileX RAM Disk sample project
app.description: Project includes ThreadX, FileX, BSP, CMT. This sample illustrates the use of the FileX embedded FAT file system. The example creates a small RAM-disk with a sample file and data, and reads the file data back into memory

app.name: NetX Duo Ping sample project
app.description: This sample project illustrates the setup and use of NetX Duo IPv4/IPv6 TCP/IP stack via ping from another node on the local network. By default, this demonstration requests an IP Address via DHCP, and displays the status and assigned IP Address via terminal I/O window. Note: default baudrate setting is 115200

app.name: NetX Duo Iperf sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates TCP and UDP network throughput, using Express Logic’s NetX Duo IPv4/IPv6 TCP/IP stack, and the industry-standard Iperf network throughput benchmark, with Jperf GUI. Note: default baudrate setting is 115200

app.name: IoT Embedded SDK sample project
app.description: This sample project illustrates the connection to Azure IoT Hub using Azure IoT Middleware for Azure RTOS. Note: default baudrate setting is 115200 and connection is ethernet/WiFi.

app.name: IoT Embedded SDK sample project with EWF library (Preliminary version)
app.description: This sample project is similar as IoT Embedded SDK sample project, however, it uses Embedded Wireless Framework library and Cat M1 for the connection.

app.name: GUIX 8bpp sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates GUIX sample project with 8 bits color look-up table

app.name: GUIX 16bpp sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates GUIX sample project with 16 bits RGB 565

app.name: GUIX 16bpp draw 2d sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates GUIX sample project with 16 bits RGB 565 and drawing 2d engine driver

app.name: USBX device CDC-ACM Class sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates the setup and use of USBX device CDC-ACM Class to communicate with the host as a serial device.

app.name: USBX Host Mass Storage Class sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates the setup and use of USBX host mass storage class to provide physical access to a data storage device.

app.name: USBX Host Communication Device Class sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates the setup and use of USBX Host Communication Device Class with USB driver using Firmware Integration Technology

app.name: ThreadX Low Power sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates how to use ThreadX with low power mode

app.name: Azure Device Update (ADU) sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates OTA firmware update. Note: this project requires bootloader project.

app.name: Secure bootloader sample project
app.description: This sample is used together with ADU sample project to provide a secure boot
